fehd.ADR_EN: 1/F (PORTION), 109 REPULSE BAY ROAD, REPULSE BAY, SOUTHERN, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港淺水灣道109號A期商場1樓(部分)

geocode_en.formatted_address: 109 Repulse Bay Road, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 109 Repulse Bay Road, Repulse Bay, 香港

result.adr_address: 109 Repulse Bay Road, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 109 Repulse Bay Road, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: The Repulse Bay

reviews.text: A gorgeous venue for a wedding.  The most spectacular place I have ever been and seen.  However, the downside was we were rushed in eating the wedding banquet for my relations wedding.  They lose a star because of this, but overall, the view is gorgeous.
Very nice location to host special events, great view and friendly services provided by the staff here.
A beautiful and romantic place for a great wedding.  Stunning view with good quality of the food. The staffs are nice and friendly.
Stunning view, relaxing atmosphere. However always crowded with mainland chinese tours, scream and shout everywhere, even smoke on the beach, sitting on YOUR mat and scratch YOUR CAR! 😖

It's a good place to step away from the busyness of HK.  For a moment, you can forget the pollution, smog, and crowds when you step into the bay. It's clean and quite quaint for a beach. There's paid parking if you drive and also easily accessible by taxi.

result.adr_address: 109 Repulse Bay Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 109 Repulse Bay Rd, Repulse Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: The Verandah 露台餐廳

reviews.text: Had my wedding reception there 6 years ago. Loved the place, atmosphere, and staff. Just been back for lunch and it's still as beautiful as ever. Great lunch (with kids in tow this time), friendly + experienced staff. =)
I love this place especially lunch buffet! 😍
Great place for relaxing.  Food is ok not excellent
Historical building with Earnest Hermingway stay for couple years at Old Repulse bay hotel.
Great service. Great food. Amazing views
